notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This research was supported by a grant from the Korea Health Technology R&D Project through the Korea Health Industry Development Institute (KHIDI), funded by the Ministry of Health & Welfare, Republic of Korea (grant number: HI16C2300) and by the Soonchunhyang University Research Fund. This fund provides financial support in the investigation, design of the study, data collection, data analysis, and interpretation of data.
